profile.name: Uddipta Gogoi
profile.title: Full Stack Developer
profile.bio: Passionate full-stack developer with expertise in building scalable web applications using modern technologies. I love creating beautiful, performant, and user-friendly experiences.
profile.detailedBio: I'm a full-stack developer based in India, specializing in React, Next.js, and Node.js. I focus on writing clean, maintainable code and building accessible web applications that users love. When I'm not coding, I enjoy contributing to open-source projects and learning new technologies.

projects.title: Minimalist Portfolio Website
projects.shortDescription: A clean, responsive portfolio showcasing projects with detailed case-study pages.
projects.fullDescription: A minimalist portfolio website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS. Features include dynamic project routing, image optimization, and a modern design system. The project demonstrates best practices in React component architecture and responsive design.
projects.background: This portfolio project was built to showcase my work and skills. It follows modern web development practices including server-side rendering, optimized images, and accessibility standards. The design emphasizes clean aesthetics and user experience.

projects.title: Single Page Developer Portfolio
projects.shortDescription: A polished single-page developer portfolio with smooth scrolling and animations.
projects.fullDescription: A modern single-page portfolio built with React and SCSS. Features include smooth scroll navigation, form validation, and a responsive design. The project demonstrates advanced CSS techniques and React best practices.
projects.background: This project showcases a clean, professional portfolio design with focus on user experience. It includes sections for introduction, experience, projects, and contact. The design is fully responsive and accessible.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.shortDescription: Full-stack e-commerce platform with authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard.
projects.fullDescription: A complete e-commerce solution built with Next.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include user authentication, product management, shopping cart, payment integration, and an admin dashboard for order management.
projects.background: This project demonstrates full-stack development skills including RESTful API design, database modeling, and third-party service integration. It implements secure authentication and payment processing.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.shortDescription: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team collaboration.
projects.fullDescription: A modern task management application built with React and Firebase. Features include real-time synchronization, team collaboration, drag-and-drop task organization, and notifications.
projects.background: This project showcases real-time application development using Firebase. It implements efficient state management and provides a smooth user experience with real-time updates.

experience.description: Developing and maintaining web applications using React, Next.js, and Node.js. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions. Implementing responsive designs and optimizing application performance.
achievements: Improved application performance by 40% through code optimization
Led migration to TypeScript, reducing bugs by 30%
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews

experience.description: Built responsive web applications for clients using React and modern CSS. Worked closely with designers to implement pixel-perfect UI components. Ensured cross-browser compatibility and accessibility standards.
achievements: Delivered 15+ client projects on time and within budget
Implemented design system reducing development time by 25%

experience.description: Developed and maintained frontend features for a SaaS platform. Collaborated with backend team to integrate APIs. Participated in agile development processes.
achievements: Reduced bundle size by 20% through code splitting
Implemented responsive design for mobile users

education.description: Focused on software engineering, data structures, algorithms, and web development. Completed coursework in database systems, computer networks, and software project management.
